content: Interesting read Abhishek. Zomato chose Food Ordering while Swiggy chose Food Delivery. As I kept reading this piece, I was wondering about two things. 2015 was like a gold rush for Food delivery startups FoodPanda, TinyOwl, Swiggy and likes. How did Swiggy make it to the finish like while others couldn’t? 2nd point is, what if Swiggy decides to go upstream and get into dining and customer feedback space? (not sure if its already available) How will that impact visit & usage frequency of Zomato?
